name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Oekaki Puzzle 4
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

"Oekaki Puzzle 4" is the familiar puzzle game that you will find in magazines. All 200 puzzles are challenging, simple but in-depth. Have fun playing these addictive puzzle games!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
